installer,linux,py3.10,brp:
'# download via button above -OR- following line' + brprompt + 'curl "http://vergil.chemistry.gatech.edu/psicode-download/Psi4conda-1.8.2-py310-Linux-x86_64.sh" -o Psi4conda-1.8.2-py310-Linux-x86_64.sh --keepalive-time 2' + brprompt + 'bash Psi4conda-1.8.2-py310-Linux-x86_64.sh -b -p $HOME/psi4conda' + bash + 'echo $\'. $HOME/psi4conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh\\nconda activate\' >> ~/.bashrc' + tcsh + 'echo "source $HOME/psi4conda/etc/profile.d/conda.csh\\nconda activate" >> ~/.tcshrc' + '
# log out, log back in so conda and psi4 in path' + brprompt + 'psi4 --test'
